data_sources.name: WHO ICD-11
data_sources.description: World Health Organization International Classification of Diseases 11th Revision
data_sources.note: Official WHO classification containing 17,000+ unique codes for injuries, diseases and symptoms

data_sources.name: CDC ICD-10-CM
data_sources.description: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ICD-10 Clinical Modification
data_sources.note: US clinical modification of ICD-10, maintained by CDC's National Center for Health Statistics (NCHS)

data_sources.name: NHS Digital
data_sources.description: National Health Service UK medical content
data_sources.note: Evidence-based health information from UK's National Health Service

data_sources.name: Infermedica Medical Database
data_sources.note: Medical knowledge base containing 2,800+ clinical concepts, reviewed by medical professionals

data_sources.name: Isabel Healthcare
data_sources.note: Covers over 6,000 medical conditions with symptom correlations

metadata.disclaimer: This symptom database is for informational and educational purposes only. It is not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of qualified healthcare providers with any questions regarding medical conditions.

Respiratory.icd_chapter: Chapter 10 - Diseases of the respiratory system (J00-J99)
Respiratory.description: Symptoms affecting the respiratory system including nose, throat, airways, and lungs

symptoms.name: Cough (Dry)
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If cough persists >3 weeks, or accompanied by fever, chest pain, or blood

symptoms.name: Cough (Wet/Productive)
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If mucus is bloody, green, or accompanied by high fever or difficulty breathing

symptoms.name: Shortness of Breath
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Seek immediate care if sudden onset, severe, or with chest pain

symptoms.name: Wheezing
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If wheezing is severe, sudden, or doesn't improve with medication

symptoms.name: Chest Tightness
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Seek immediate care if with chest pain, arm pain, or difficulty breathing

symptoms.name: Runny Nose
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If symptoms persist >10 days or with severe facial pain

symptoms.name: Stuffy Nose
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent >10 days, with high fever, or severe facial pain

symptoms.name: Sneezing
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Generally not serious unless accompanied by difficulty breathing

symptoms.name: Sore Throat
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If severe, persistent >1 week, or with high fever and rash

symptoms.name: Difficulty Swallowing
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent, worsening, or with unintentional weight loss

symptoms.name: Hoarseness
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If lasting >2 weeks without improvement

symptoms.name: Rapid Breathing
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden, severe, or with chest pain or confusion

symptoms.name: Chest Congestion
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If with high fever, severe difficulty breathing, or chest pain

Neurological.icd_chapter: Chapter 6 - Diseases of the nervous system (G00-G99)
Neurological.description: Symptoms affecting the brain, nerves, and neurological function

symptoms.name: Headache
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Sudden severe headache, or with fever, confusion, vision changes, or stiff neck

symptoms.name: Migraine
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden change in pattern, or most severe headache ever experienced

symptoms.name: Dizziness
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden, severe, or with chest pain, difficulty speaking, or weakness

symptoms.name: Vertigo
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden onset with severe symptoms or neurological signs

symptoms.name: Confusion
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Seek immediate care - confusion can indicate serious condition

symptoms.name: Memory Loss
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden, worsening rapidly, or affecting daily function

symptoms.name: Difficulty Concentrating
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If significantly impacting work or daily activities

symptoms.name: Numbness
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden, on one side of body, or with other neurological symptoms

symptoms.name: Tingling Sensation
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent, worsening, or with weakness

symptoms.name: Tremors
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden onset, worsening, or affecting daily activities

symptoms.name: Seizures
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: EMERGENCY - Call emergency services immediately

symptoms.name: Loss of Balance
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden, severe, or with other neurological symptoms

symptoms.name: Blurred Vision
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden, severe, or with eye pain or flashes of light

symptoms.name: Double Vision
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Seek prompt medical attention - can indicate serious condition

symptoms.name: Sensitivity to Light
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If severe, with severe headache and stiff neck, or eye injury

symptoms.name: Sensitivity to Sound
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent or significantly affecting quality of life

Gastrointestinal.icd_chapter: Chapter 11 - Diseases of the digestive system (K00-K95)
Gastrointestinal.description: Symptoms affecting the digestive system from mouth to intestines

symptoms.name: Nausea
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent, with severe headache, or signs of dehydration

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If bloody vomit, signs of dehydration, or persistent >24 hours

symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If bloody stool, severe dehydration, high fever, or lasting >3 days

symptoms.name: Constipation
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden change, severe pain, or blood in stool

symptoms.name: Abdominal Pain
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden severe pain, with fever, bloody stool, or persistent vomiting

symptoms.name: Stomach Cramps
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If severe, persistent, or with other concerning symptoms

symptoms.name: Bloating
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent, with weight loss, or severe pain

symptoms.name: Gas
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Generally not serious unless with severe pain or persistent

symptoms.name: Heartburn
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If frequent (>2 times/week), with difficulty swallowing, or chest pain

symptoms.name: Acid Reflux
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If frequent, worsening, or with weight loss

symptoms.name: Loss of Appetite
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent with significant weight loss

symptoms.name: Increased Appetite
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If sudden change with weight changes or other symptoms

symptoms.name: Blood in Stool
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: Seek medical attention promptly - requires evaluation

symptoms.name: Indigestion
symptoms.whenToSeekCare: If persistent, severe, or with weight loss

low.description: Generally not urgent, can be managed at home or with routine appointment
low.action: Monitor symptoms and consider seeing a doctor if persistent

medium.description: May require medical attention, schedule appointment soon
medium.action: Schedule a doctor's appointment within a few days

high.action: Seek medical care soon, same day if possible

critical.action: CALL EMERGENCY SERVICES OR GO TO EMERGENCY ROOM IMMEDIATELY

recommended_apis.name: Infermedica API
recommended_apis.description: Digital triage and symptom assessment. Contains 2,800+ clinical concepts

api_integration_notes.note: This static database can be enhanced with API calls for real-time diagnosis
